rows.label: tlk70000074_04_msg0001
rows.name:
The conference with Gula will
be over in no time with the
intervention of Your Eminences.

rows.label: tlk70000074_04_msg0002
rows.name:
Ah, might I add, the Melosian
Honey present from Gula's special
envoy was incredibly delicious!

rows.label: tlk70000074_04_msg0003
rows.name:
I could tell from the start that the
Blade-Driver relationship you have is
different to those in our country.

rows.label: tlk70000074_04_msg0004
rows.name:
In Superbia, a Blade is, in effect,
nothing more than a weapon. One
that puts fear into people...

rows.label: tlk70000074_04_msg0005
rows.name:
But as far as I can tell from looking
at you, you seem to treat them more
like friends than weapons.

rows.label: tlk70000074_04_msg0006
rows.name:
Iirans have always promoted coexistence
with Blades. Perhaps that's why they
continue to support you.
